details: The script utilizes the Snakemake workflow management system. It runs on a SLURM cluster, requiring 10 nodes with 10 tasks. Each node is allocated 50GB of memory. The job has a time limit of 36 hours. The script loads several modules, including "default-impi" and "samtools-1.4-gcc-5.4.0-derfxbk".  The script then activates a conda environment named "py37" and runs Snakemake with 10 parallel jobs (-j10).
